snp5.7:1.3: “I am not able to cross the great flood.
snp5.7:1.5: relying on which I may cross this flood.”
snp5.7:2.3: supported by the perception ‘there is nothing’, cross the flood.
snp5.7:2.4: Giving up sensual pleasures, refraining from chatter,
snp5.7:2.5: watch day and night for the ending of craving.”
snp5.7:3.3: “depending on nothingness, all else left behind,
